example.eg: If you organize your work in order of priority, then you can be sure you are doing the most important things first.
example.egtrans: 如果你按优先顺序组织工作，就可以确保最重要的工作最先完成。

example.eg: This part of the project is the most important, so we need to make it our priority.
example.egtrans: 项目的这个部分最为重要，所以应该是我们优先考虑的事。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 优先考虑的事, 第一要务

example.eg: Feeding your family has priority over buying expensive toys.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 优先，有优先权, 重要，首要

example.eg: Paying your rent on time should not be a low priority.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不重要的事, 低优先的事

example.eg: Making good grades should be your top priority at college.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 第一优先, 最优先地位
